short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension to easily help you run KhaHack in MineKhan!!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: MineKhan is a game. Modifications for MineKhan are very rare, and none are made into public extensions (yet). I think that KhaHack is one of the best modifications for MineKhan. You should install it, as it is very helpful.
